title: Dear Zindagi
writer: Krishnan Hariharan, Kausar Munir, Gauri Shinde
short_cast: Alia Bhatt, Shah Rukh Khan, Ira Dubey, Yashaswini Dayama, Gautmik, Raj Bhansali, Rohit Saraf, Atul Kale, Kunal Kapoor, Angad Bedi, Ali Zafar, Aditya Roy Kapur
cast: Alia Bhatt, Shah Rukh Khan, Ira Dubey, Yashaswini Dayama, Gautmik, Raj Bhansali, Rohit Saraf, Atul Kale, Kunal Kapoor, Angad Bedi, Ali Zafar, Aditya Roy Kapur

desc: A young cinematographer with a bright professional future and a lack of empathy learns the importance of balancing ambition with humanity.
